summary: Makes several female followers more attractive.
descriptionHtml:
This mod aims to make the faces of several female followers more attractive.

This should be fully compatible with any texture mods.

Currently, the following characters are affected:

-Ysolda (major overhaul)
-Uthgerd the Unbroken (looks younger)
-Aela the Huntress (removed facepaint, other minor adjustments)
-Ria (removed facepaint, other minor adjustments)
-Njada Stonearm (better eyes)

I do take requests!

Also, I do intend to make a male version of this mod, eventually.
author: Pocoloon-Bulljump
